Reviews.Title: “First visit and wont be the last.”
Reviews.Author: maureen b
Reviews.Content: On arriving at hotel was very impressed with the lay out, location and checking in. The staff were very friendly and couldnt do enough for you. The hotel location is just next to the Mall this made shopping very easy, also there were a couple of good restaurants within walking distance. The rooms were spotless, large and well laid out. Very light and airy, the bed linens and towels were fantastic, in fact the bed was more comfy than the one we have at home. The breakfasts at this hotel is the best we have ever had, all the hot food and cakes were freshly made and plentiful. The only downfall we made with this hotel was not staying longer, that will happen next year. Thank you to all the staff at Homewood Suites Daytona Beach.

Reviews.Title: “Can Never Go Wrong Staying Here!”
Reviews.Author: gavballmomteacher
Reviews.Content: Very welcoming and pleasant! Made checkin easy. The only negative was room key didn't work first swipe so I had to go back to the front desk. They corrected problem immediately. Rooms are very large and comfortable. Love the room fragance....not musty. Very clean. Bed and pillows are as comfy as our beds at home (maybe even more comfy). Love the fluffy white towels and high vanity. Kitchen is completely stocked and enjoy the full size refrig. Nice LARGE LCD high quality tv. Felt very pampered. Kitchen staff pleasant and did a wonderful job keeping the food and drinks stocked for guests to enjoy. Will definitely stay here again when we visit Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Solid and pet friendly”
Reviews.Author: rafael l
Reviews.Content: Very comfortable and with nice rooms and pet friendly was better than the Tallahassee home wood which was musty unlike this home wood Would stay again an is across the street from speedway for car racing fans

Reviews.Title: “There when we needed them most, Homewood Suites Delivers Big.”
Reviews.Author: MGutowski
Reviews.Content: As first time Grandparents living on the west coast of Florida, we were in need of short term residency during our daughter’s labor and delivery process. My wife and I were so pleased when we arrived at Homewood Suites in Daytona Beach. The very pleasant staff took care of our every need and question, and had us relaxing in a short time. The manager Kyra personally welcomed us at the beautiful breakfast served the next morning, and spoke to us often as our stay progressed. We made several trips to and from the Halifax Medical Center, and were delighted to see it was only 3.5 miles to our east. Very convenient location close to beach, highway, and many nice shopping locations. Overall we would say this is the nicest hotel we have stayed in at any price. You would be hard-pressed to find a nicer place.

Reviews.Title: “Great family trip!”
Reviews.Author: S S
Reviews.Content: The hotel was wonderful. It is located next to a ton of shopping and restaurants. It was very easy to get to the beach. We loved the rooms and the breakfast each morning. The staff was very helpful with all of our requests. They went above and beyond. When I visit Daytona again I will stay at the Homewood!

Reviews.Title: “"Affordable Outstanding Hotel"”
Reviews.Author: MauiWowe
Reviews.Content: Great location and I'm always impressed with Homewood suites rooms. Bed was so comfortable, the kitchenette is a plus and the staff is polite and helpful.Shopping mall behind hotel ,restaurants and air port all close by helped to make for a perfect stay. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Hotel for its Price!”
Reviews.Author: Jared889
Reviews.Content: My family and I came for a vacation to the beach. This hotel is literally right next door to Daytona Speedway! It has amazingly clean rooms, great TVs, good breakfast, and more. Not to mention their two pools--1 regular and 1 hot tub, plus their fitness room and basketball hoop. Also, this hotel is about 8 minutes away from the beach! This is probably one of the best I've been to in an extremely log time. If you want a great hotel for great value, go to this one!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place!!”
Reviews.Author: Carley F
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed here a couple nights in Daytona before we checked into our condo for the next week and we really enjoyed it. I booked an average room and when I walked in I thought I was in a suite. Very well priced for the rooms and from now on I think anytime I am in the daytona area and need to stay at a hotel this is going to be my first pick.

Reviews.Title: “This was a perfect place.”
Reviews.Author: lindamarie1226
Reviews.Content: This was the first time staying at this particular Hilton hotel. This was a very clean hotel,beds were comfortable and the breakfast had good variety of stuff to pick from. Will stay at this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: afletch10
Reviews.Content: As a family we have stayed at this hotel before, and our experience was exceptional. The rooms and the service are top notch. We have known general manager Kyra Woodward for many years and have followed her from hotel to hotel in the area. She always makes sure we are taken care of and does so with a smile. We are looking forward to our next stay there.

Reviews.Title: “Like I Was Their Only Guest”
Reviews.Author: Hose1
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Homewood Suites in Daytona Beach (Speedway) earlier this year and the entire staff treated me like I was their only guest. At every turn, someone from the hotel was there to greet me and ask if I needed something. I have stayed in Daytona every year for the past 24-years (in the same hotel) and this was my first time with the Homewood Suites. I have already booked a return visit and look forward to going back to see some of the new friends made earlier this year. Excellent rating is an understatement! HO-1623

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home AND pet friendly”
Reviews.Author: Denise S
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at Homewood Suites in Daytona Beach on several occasions, most recently January 2012. The hotel consistently provides a good quality place to stay at a reasonable price. The rooms are always clean and the breakfast is always pretty good. Best of all - this hotel is also pet friendly. However, arrangements need to be made in advance and there is a pet fee. This is a great place to stay - and is very conveniently located near the Speedway and airport.

Reviews.Title: “An unexpected gem of a hotel”
Reviews.Author: cynJacksonville_Fl
Reviews.Content: I've stayed here for business twice in the last few months and just made another reservation for an 11 night stay. This place is amazing. The entire staff is top-notch (especially Anthony), the breakfasts and weeknight dinners are far above average and the rooms are very well thought out, clean, spacious and subtly decorated. The bed is very comfortable, the dedicated desk (not a combo desk/dining table) is roomy and the wireless is free. The location is very central and convenient. All for a very reasonable rate. And did I mention the free wine and beer at dinner? Based on my great experience here I have just stayed in another Homewood Suites elsewhere in Florida. It did not even come close to the quality of this hotel. I have always been a devoted Residence Inn fan for business travel but I would never even think of staying anywhere else in the Daytona area. I'm looking forward to my upcoming stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value and Service”
Reviews.Author: WindsorP
Reviews.Content: Wile travelling from Miami to Charleston,my wife and I stayed at Homewood Suites near the Daytona Speedway.We only stayed one night,but the service and friendliness of the staff was excellent,The studio suite we had was spotless and was roomy with a good TV and fridge and kitchen facilities.There was complimentary evening meals and breakfasts.The hotel is only five minutes from the Speedway,and about a ten minute drive to Daytona Beach.There are plenty of restaurants nearby.The hotel is only about a mile and a half from I95,which makes it very convenient for anyone travelling north or south on the interstate.Overall it was a very positive experience,and I would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Best staff ever!”
Reviews.Author: 911TechWV
Reviews.Content: We spent over a month with these guys. Hotel was awesome! Food was awesome! Our kids loved the staff, and really enjoyed the deal we worked out with them. One of the best fitness centers I have ever seen at a hotel. Very worth the stay!!

Reviews.Title: “Nice enough to live here”
Reviews.Author: LynnetteB
Reviews.Content: We were very pleasantly surprised. The lobby was beautiful. The room was very nice with a flat rotating flat screen tv. Sink area is outside the bathroom which works great when there are more then one person. Kitchen is nice- refridgerator, micro, stove top... Mon-Th they had continental breakfast and a dinner. Pool area and hot tub are also nice. Nothing to complain about but that we had a super long walk to our room. This place is huge.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel and suites”
Reviews.Author: OcalaTraveler2011
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a place to stay for the night near the Daytona Speedway. We checked Trip Advisor and Homewood Suties had the location and favorable reviews. We paid $111 and got a very nice suite on the first floor. It was one very large room with a living area and a kitchenette off to one end. It was roomey, clean, up to date. We both got a good nights sleep and then had a very good, complementary hot breakfast in the morning in a nice roomy, open atrium. I gave this hotel/suites my highest rating. It was an excellent value, and I would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “"Very Nice"”
Reviews.Author: travelinmomdad
Reviews.Content: Stayed this past weekend for an overnite, room was nice. Bathroom was clean although the toliet seat looked extremely worn, and there was hair in the tub. The paint on the wall was mismatched looked kind of sloppy.The staff was pleasant, and the breakfast was very tasty, the kids enjoyed it. The area seemed safe and was well lit, and no fee to park. Walk to Daytona speedway.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Room, great location!”
Reviews.Author: SRP8879
Reviews.Content: We only stayed here for 1 night, but I could have stayed a lot longer. The bed was so comfortable, I didn't want to get out of it. The hotel is newer and everything is in pristine condition. The kitchenette was just the right size and well equipped and the bathrooms were spotless. The staff was very nice, always got a hello whenever we saw them! The location is great too. I'll stay longer next time!

Reviews.Title: “What a hotel should be”
Reviews.Author: JeanLouise55
Reviews.Content: We needed overnight lodging in Daytona Beach and picked this property because of a good rate. Definitely exceeded expectations! Clean, attractive, nice reception and pool areas, and excellent free supper with wine and hot breakfast. We were so impressed with the stay...wouldn't have minded staying longer. In this day of poor service, it renewed my faith in the lodging industry. Keep up the good work!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay in Daytona”
Reviews.Author: edwds
Reviews.Content: My wife, I and another couple stayed here for 5 nights during the Daytona 500 race weekend. It doesn't get any better than this for race accommodations; a short walk to the track or the mall. Upon arrival we were greeted by a friendly and helpful Erika during check-in. Throughout our stay, every member of the staff from the front desk, housekeeping to food service, greeted us with a smile and were very helpful. They take such great care of their guests! We felt like we were staying with family. Overall an excellent stay that exceeded our expectations! Being a Hilton Honors member, I've stayed at numerous Hilton properties. This was a very clean hotel. It smelled fresh and always saw someone cleaning. Thank you so much Kyra and the entire Homewood Suites Daytona Beach Speedway-Airport team for taking such great care of us! You turned a weekend of racing into even more enjoyable time We cannot wait to return!

Reviews.Title: “Good accomodations, freindly staff”
Reviews.Author: Haliday77
Reviews.Content: Stayed for one week prior to the Daytona race weekend. Good clean rooms. Handy kitchen facilities. Welcome home snacks and breakfasts included. Friendly staff not only at reception but also with room service / cleaners. This hotel deserves the awards and accolades in its trophy cabinet!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect place to stay during race”
Reviews.Author: HKexpat88
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 4 nights during the Rolex-24 race, for race accommodation it doesn't get much better than this. - 5 minutes walk from the racetrack. - Very spacious rooms/suites. - Free Wifi. - Free meals at the restaurant (!!!). - Free parking. Nice tiny fitness room, only a bench was missing. Considering that this was during a big race then it was actually surprisingly cheap. Definitely the place to stay if you are going to the Daytona Raceway.

Reviews.Title: “Location excellent. Dinner and breakfast included!”
Reviews.Author: thetravelers66
Reviews.Content: M-F you not only get a free breakfast; but a nice dinner dinner. 1/2 block from crossing the street and into the tunnel entrance for the speedway. Shopping center out the back. Gas and convenience store at street crossing. Restaurants nearby. Rooms all had cooking kitchen and living room area. Our stay was during a race Elevators seemed slow and had very dirty carpets; but it was very busy. Staff was wonderful. I do think it was pricey. I used the Hampton inn (about 1 block away) two weeks prior and it was VERY CLEAN and provided about the same breakfast and was much cheaper. Beach was about 20 min away (w/traffic). Lots to see and do in this area

Reviews.Title: “Excellent locale for race fans, Excellent staff”
Reviews.Author: LomaPatti
Reviews.Content: I have stayed here twice now and will stay again when I can. Housekeeping is the best as I never saw them but my room was always done! Breakfast was wonderful, hot tub was clean and welcoming and never busy. They catered our evening dinner and it was incredible... this staff rocks... if you need something they will help you! And walking to the track was so easy and quicker than driving over!

Reviews.Title: “Very Clean Hotel.”
Reviews.Author: WhizKelly
Reviews.Content: I have been a Hilton Honors member for years. By far this was the cleanest hotel that I have ever stayed in. It smelled fresh and I always saw someone cleaning. My daughter loved the dinner and morning breakfast. Overall an excellent stay.

Reviews.Title: “THE place to stay, if your at the track”
Reviews.Author: Slayridez06
Reviews.Content: What a great place !!!! Suite was very large, full kitchen, nice bathroom, very clean, very comfortable. Breakfast was included, and it was great !!!! Good variety of hot and cold items, with fruit and cereal. They also have complimentary Dinner Monday thru Thursday....but i did not get to try it out. Extremely convenient location to the Daytona Speedway. Much nicer and same price as the Hampton Inn that is also close to the Speedway. I choose this place based upon all of the great reviews.........good job everyone !!!! i hope this is a helpful review for you.

Reviews.Title: “Great Nascar location”
Reviews.Author: ohgirl16
Reviews.Content: We stayed here in June, 2011. What a great location to walk to the legendary Daytona Motor Speedway. We are NASCAR fans so to walk there and see this track was awesome. The hotel was clean and the staff was pleasant. The room was a suite w/a kitchen, table and sitting area. It was all very nice and clean. The bed was not bad at all. The bathroom area set up was nice, the only complaint I had was the bathroom floor area was dirty. I always wear socks and they were dirty brown when I got done getting ready. Plenty of restaurants nearby too. The pool area was clean.

Reviews.Title: “This place is awesome!”
Reviews.Author: L R
Reviews.Content: After reading the reviews of various nearby hotels, I booked a room here for a 2 night stay in early October, 2011, and told my friends about it. Well, they arrived first and were blown away! They had no idea what to expect and were pleasantly surprised. The rooms were spacious and clean, and the staff was friendly. My friends returned last week, and I will have the pleasure of visting real soon. Thank you for making my stay enjoyable! I am sure future visits will be just as enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: “What a surprise!”
Reviews.Author: Miss Yip
Reviews.Content: Quick business trip--boss gave me three choices of hotels. I looked them up on Trip Advisor. This property was the most highly rated of the three but I would not have stayed here without reading the reviews. Well, what a surprise...great property, friendly staff, comfy big bed with lots of fabulous pillows, clean bathroom, Neutrogena products, nice breakfast...loved this hotel. Nice price too!

Reviews.Title: “One week stay”
Reviews.Author: thomastholmes512
Reviews.Content: Room was immaculate and freshened every day. Staff was excellent. Food was excellent.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: jean d
Reviews.Content: My husband and I found the suite to be updated, well maintained, clean and nicely decorated. The staff was pleasant and helpful . The lobby as well as the eating area was very clean. The breakfast was free and offered a nice variety of breakfast foods. Overall stay wonderful and I will return whenever I am in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Team Seattle is at home at Homewood Suites”
Reviews.Author: TeamSeattle4Ever
Reviews.Content: Our entire race team, Team Seattle stayed at the Homewood Suites for the Rolex 24 hours at Daytona. I can't say enough good things! We loved the accommodations, and the staff is wonderful! They take such great care of their guests! From breakfast everyday to dinner on weekdays, its the little touches that made it a great stay! Plus the staff is like a family and are so friendly! We followed the General Manager Kyra to the Homewood Suites and we are so glad we did! Thank you so much Kyra and the entire Homewood team for taking such great care of Team Seattle! We cannot wait to return!

Reviews.Title: “High School Baseball Team loved this hotel”
Reviews.Author: BoosterClubPres2011
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel for our high school baseball team when we played in a tournament in the area. The rooms were beautiful, large and very clean. Each came with a sofa bed and kitchen. Tthe boys had a good meal to start their day with the free breakfast which consisted of eggs, waffles, bacon, hot and cold cereal, muffins, etc. Each evening there was food served from 5 - 7 pm (weeknights) as well. The boys also enjoyed the pool and basketball courts. The hotel was located within walking distance to Friendly's and other places to eat. I will try to stay at a Homewood Suites whenever I travel. I can highly recommend this hotel. The staff was great, especially Marisol Moreno who went out of her way to make our stay the best experience possible. She was a pleasure to deal with.

Reviews.Title: “They took care of our team - We had a GREAT time!”
Reviews.Author: Mamabearwith2
Reviews.Content: Normally, I travel by myself or with family. This was the first time that my family had ever travelled with an entourage of more than 30. Not to mention 20 little league football players (between the ages of 7 and 8)...Of course, Praying that the trip went better than I expected. Well...the Homewood Suites staff made it all possible for us. They catered to our every need. Their breakfast and evening refreshments were exactly what today's families eat. They had games for the kids to play. We really couldn't ask for much more. If I could, I would have asked for an indoor pool, so that we all could further enjoy ourselves during our cold December stay. If I'm ever in the Daytona Beach area again, I plan to stop and say "Hello."

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: Buckeye460
Reviews.Content: one bdrm suite WONDERFUL!! So nice to have a separate area for the living room/kitchen area from the bedroom. Very large with a roomy bathroom. beware- there is NO STOVE. Full size fridge, full size dishwasher and microwave, but no stove! Bit disappointed with that. Beds comfy and soft. Breakfast was good with plenty to choose from. The location IS close to the Speedway, shopping etc however- getting in and out is tricky. Only one way in and one way out. You have to completely circle the building to exit and can only turn north (away from International Blvd).

Reviews.Title: “Superb customer service”
Reviews.Author: Event_Emcee
Reviews.Content: Once again, I was met with fantastic customer service at the Homewood Suites Daytona Beach Airport property! I have stayed at this hotel numerous times and on multiple occasions, Anthony, one of the front desk staff, has gone out of his way to be courteous and polite while being extremely helpful! Dennis, among the others, has also done a great job, but Anthony's dedication to doing a top-notch job is noteworthy. Thank you for your service and because of the character of the front desk employees, I will always stay at this hotel while in Daytona Beach!

Reviews.Title: “Return Visit to Homewood Suites”
Reviews.Author: MarleneU
Reviews.Content: This was my second stay at Homewood Suites within the past 3 months. The hotel is very clean and very conveniently located directly across from the raceway and in the middle of lots of shopping and chain restaurants. You can actually walk to the mall next door on the east side or walk on the west side to a Marshalls or Ruby Tuesdays. If you venture south about 1/4 block there is a Pizzeria Uno. The accommodations are fine and what I expect from a Homewood Suites. They are clean and everything is provided including a breakfast and dinner which are "so so". The staff are for the most part very friendly and accommodating and aim to please. I was located on the 4th floor in room 403 which is directly next to the elevator--that was a drawback--the noise from the elevator traveling up and down from Floor 1 to Floor 4. Although it may not bother most people, I am a light sleeper. My stay was only for 1 nite but had I asked for a change of room I am certain they would have accommodated me. My room had a king size bed, a sleeper sofa large bathroom and a full kitchen with dishes and utensils. When I do return to Daytona Beach, I will once again stay at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “More than you could imagine for the price”
Reviews.Author: zr1woman
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were in Daytona Beach for my 60th birthday for me to "Drive the Speedway". Since we were going to be there a couple of days we decided to stay in a suite. There were many in the area to pick from and I am very glad we chose HOMEWOOD. The service personnel (all) were wonderful. The room was clean, comfortable and almost like home. The location to the speedway was within walking distance, Volusia Mall is in the backyard. The breakfast and "dinner reception" (Monday-Thursday) is enough so that you would only have to buy lunch. And it was good ! I would highly recommend this hotel to a friend for business or pleasure. Worth every penny of the money spent.

Reviews.Title: “Very impressed with this hotel”
Reviews.Author: NcLetsGo
Reviews.Content: We were in town visiting a relative and stayed at this hotel based on reviews we had seen on several sites. Here's what we liked....all rooms are suites - they're not huge, but we like the extra living area. The kitchen amenities are nice - the FULL size 12-cup coffee maker (and real coffee cups) is GREAT as well as the fridge if you like to buy your own beer/soft drinks instead of paying for them out of a machine. Freezer has ice maker which eliminates those pesky trips down the hall to the ice machine with the bucket that is always too big for the plastic baggy liner they give you! The bed was very comfortable, two types of pillows, thick soft bath towels and, best of all, everything was VERY clean. I was not impressed with the fact that I had to wait almost 10 minutes to check in because there was only one person at the front desk and she was taking a reservation over the phone. By the time she hung up there were three others behind me also waiting to check in. It is right next to a nice size mall and across the street from the Speedway. We arrived the day AFTER the Daytona 500 so it was very quiet! The breakfast didn't look like much, but then we don't usually partake in that. Overall, for the AAA rate of $113.00/night, we were very pleased and would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Incredible hotel”
Reviews.Author: Hamimomof3
Reviews.Content: I am very particular when it comes to hotels. I always do research and read reviews before I book. My research paid off. This was by far the cleanest hotel I have stayed in. The room was spacious and looked like brand new. The breakfast was terrific as well. Thanks. We will definitely be back.

Reviews.Title: “New, clean, and beautiful”
Reviews.Author: Busy18Bee
Reviews.Content: This hotel was unbelievable. Clean, new, spacious, well appointed, great staff. We come to Daytona regularly to visit family and have struggled with accomodations through the years and are thrilled that we have finally found a solution. We were traveling with my husband, toddler daughter, father, and dog. We rented a 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom suite with living room and kitchen. We requested the first floor suite due to all the items we were traveling with, and even though it was a smoking room, they purified it before our arrival and you would never have known it was a smoking room. We requested a crib, DVD player, and late check out and the friendly staff met all our requests. The parking was easy, there were several restaurants very close by, the breakfast the next morning was great. We usually dread our trips to the area but this clean, nice hotel actually gives us something to look forward to.

Reviews.Title: “Quite a nice stay!”
Reviews.Author: HALEKIPA
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel by looking thoroughly via many web sites for options of amenities and cost per night. I was in the area on family health business and my efforts were aimed to be closest to that facility. Check-in was very pleasant with the front desk agent. The suite was clean and comfortable. The head housekeeper was very kind to welcome me while I carried luggage with both hands, and then graciously opened my door for me. Breakfast was sufficient for my minimal requirements. The jacuzzi and pool were a nice relief at the end of the day, although it would be nice that they didnt close down the jacuzzi (very promptly) at 10pm, as a late night quiet soak would have been nice. I reviewed my stay based upon my own status as a General Manager of a 123 suite hotel in Santa Fe, and they definately passed the test.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: EESatlantaga
Reviews.Content: Great stay. I travel every week for business and I don't remember the last time I have stayed in a better facility.

Reviews.Title: “Nice facilitly, but not for long term stays ironically”
Reviews.Author: bratl
Reviews.Content: This visit is my sixth or so visit to the Daytona Homewood Suites this year. The hotel still feels new and is always kept clean. The second floor cleaning staff is especially good: they don't leave dirty dishes in the sink, but the higher floor staff has left dishes in the sink for several days. (My reference point was Residence Inn hotels I've used before where the dishes were cleaned every day.) If you stay here you will have a nice night's sleep. Despite that, I probably won't stay here as much in the future because it seems like EVERY one bedroom suite in the hotel connects to another one bedroom suite. After a few weeks of listening to your neighbor's TV, phone conversations, or crying kids the connecting room concept gets annoying. I understand why they might want a few, but as a diamond member of Hilton here on a long term stay, it's disappointing that they don't have a few non-connecting rooms available when I check in.

Reviews.Title: “kudos to the general manager for great customer service”
Reviews.Author: WannaRetire
Reviews.Content: Three of us stayed at this property while attending the festival @ St. Demetrios Greek Orthodox Church, which is only five miles from the property. By the way, if you love ethnic festivals, this one is a MUST!!! Great food (lamb grilled on a spit), libations, entertainment and fellowship, sitting on the church's dock overlooking the Banana River!!! Great fun!!! Back to the hotel. The property is very new, having opened in early 2006. The facility is very clean and bright, and the morning complimentary breakfast is quite nice. The management is trying to maintain the property, as evidenced by carpet-cleaning crews who were there for several days during this period of time. There was a note to that effect in our suite. Our issue was with the logistics of the carpet-cleaning rotation. The facility was no more than 50% occupied, and we were only there for one night. When we came back to our suite from the festival late Saturday night, all quite tired, we found that the carpeting in our suite had been cleaned (it looked very nice), and was still a bit wet. When we brought this to the attention of the duty desk clerk, he was not extremely interested nor helpful ("I'm not the one who checked you in"). We left a comment card for the general manager, and within several days heard back from both him and his administrative assistant, apologizing for the inconvenience (admittedly minor). The GM "sweetened the pot" by refunding our room charge!!! I would highly recommend this property to folks visiting Daytona Beach. It's very convenient to the airport and the Speedway, and is an easy 10-12 minute drive to the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Just spent 5 nights at this "Sweet" hotel. Excellent Deal!”
Reviews.Author: Illusive333
Reviews.Content: Stayed 12/14 - 12/19/2006: Not quite the amenities of an Embassy Suites hotel, this place was outstanding. Two rooms, with two TV's, microwave, full refigerator, flattop burners, plates, silverware, utensils, glasses, popcorn, coffee and cleanliness were a PLUS. Everyday breakfasts, and evening receptions on Mon - Thur (beer, wine, & hot entrees) make this hotel a wonderful place to stay ... at exceptional prices, not to mention the large hottub, decent sized pool, a half basketball court, a fitness room, and a business center.

Reviews.Title: “Good choice”
Reviews.Author: David W
Reviews.Content: This hotel, which opened in February, 2006 per hotel staff, is located on a side street across from the Speedway adjacent to a shopping mall. The hotel staff was friendly. Our suite was clean and in excellent condition. Kitchen was nice, with full-size refrigerator, microwave and a few dishes, plus a table for meals. One negative for us was the lack of a door between the sleeping area and the bathroom vanity area. (The tub and toilet were in a separate room.) The early riser definitely bothered the late sleeper. There are a couple of restaurants within walking distance of the hotel. Since we were there on Sunday night, the mall was closed and several low cost meal choices within walking distance in a nearby strip shopping center were closed. The morning breakfast was adequate but did not have as many choices as the Hampton Inn we stayed the night before or other Homewood Suites in other cities. One factor may have been the low occupancy rate in the hotel that night.

Reviews.Title: “Highly Recomended”
Reviews.Author: danno719
Reviews.Content: If you are not interested in staying right on the beach in Daytona, I highly recomend this hotel. We drove to the beach every day we were there during the off season, and enjoyed our trip very much. The staff was great, and very helpful. The breakfast was very good and plentyful. They told us that they even serve dinner during the week. We checked in late Friday and checked out at noon on Monday, so we missed out on that. The pool was small but clean. Seing how we were the only ones at the pool, it was more than big enough. The room was clean, spacious and comfortable. It's loctaed near everything you could need. Excelent hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Refreshing Hotel Experience”
Reviews.Author: jso9961
Reviews.Content: If you are staying in Daytona (city) and want to avoid the seedy places, then choose the HOMEWOOD SUITES (Daytona Beach Speedway - Airport). This hotel opened in early 2006 and is very nice and super clean. ROOM: We stayed in the smallest room, the studio suite, but it far exceeded any other standard hotel room we have stayed in. They have a "feel at home theme" and it shows. Each room has a king size bed with lots of pillows, huge TV, desk, updated decor (tropical plants & flower arrangements), pull out couch, and nice kitchen. The kitchen has a full fridge, stove, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker, toaster, dishes, and garbage disposal, etc. Our room was next to the elevator and we couldn't hear a thing. BREAKFAST: The hotel offers a fresh breakfast buffet each morning (7-10 am weekends) with juice/coffee/milk, cereal, bagels/bread, fruit, bacon/sausage, egg patties (not recommended) and make-it-yourself waffles. One morning, we ran a little late to the buffet and the staff brought us items that they had already put away - with a smile. In fact, the entire hotel staff is FRIENDLY which can be rare even in the hospitality industry. THINGS TO DO: You can see the speedway from the hotel and can easily walk to it or the Mall if you are looking for something to do. Several good restaurants are within walking distance or you can buy groceries and use the kitchen. OTHER SERVICES: We didn't use the pool or business center, but they looked well-kept. The only potential issue could be parking - they did not seem to have very many spaces. Luckily we were there in off-season, but I'm not sure what it's like on race weekends. OVERALL: You won't be disappointed in this hotel especially with their reasonable rates ($99 per night in August).

Reviews.Title: “Perfect place to stay”
Reviews.Author: jandkc
Reviews.Content: New hotel. Suites were amazingly large with stocked kitchens, exceptionally clean, nicely furnished, and comfortable! Every staff member was cheerful, friendly, and helpful. Pool, hot tub, exercise room, and basketball court at this location. Full hot breakfast included in cost of room. (Dinner is served for those staying during the week) Not the typical "trashed out", drab, smokey rooms found in Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Loved It!!!”
Reviews.Author: sfwasabi
Reviews.Content: AWESOME! There is not much to say. The room was gorgeous. The furniture was beautiful. The bedding was fluffy and luxurious. We were SHOCKED that we got such a nice room for the price that we did. The breakfast buffet was delicious: Waffles, eggs, bacon, cereal, milk, juice, pastries. The only problem that we had was that the room next door had a dog that was barking non-stop, so we complained to the lobby on our way out to dinner and we heard nothing more from the dog after we got back.

HotelInfo.Name: Homewood Suites Daytona Beach Speedway - Airport
HotelInfo.Address: 165 Bill France Boulevard, Daytona Beach, FL 32114
